title: 'Here, making each day of the year.' What song is this? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here, there and everywhere by The Beatles.On of their sweetest lovesongs.I can see there is already one answer, haven’t read it though, but should be the same. “changing my life with a wave of her handnobody candeny that there’s something there.”
“Here, There, and Everywhere,” by the Beatles & lead vocal by Paul McCartney… Song was first released on the Revolver album of 1966…
